title: Pre-existing merge conflicts prevent build completion
issue: The codebase has unresolved merge conflicts in multiple files that prevent `pnpm typecheck` and `pnpm build` from completing successfully. These conflicts appear to be from merges of agent branches (tkt-045, tkt-052) that were not fully resolved.
suggestion: Resolve all merge conflict markers (<<<<<<< HEAD, =======, >>>>>>>) in the affected files. Review the conflicting changes from agent/tkt-045 and agent/tkt-052 branches and determine which version should be kept or if they need to be merged.
